Key Match Events: India beat Ireland by eight wickets
Arshdeep Singh dismissed both openers in his second over
Jasprit Bumrah had Tector caught with a short ball that ricocheted off his glove and helmet
Hardik Pandya picked off three batters in nine balls
Gareth Delaney and Josh Little managed to haul the total up towards three figures
Miscellaneous Highlights: The ball reared and kicked and jagged and spat and seamed and stopped
The main difference was that when Sharma caught hold of one, it carried all the way over the boundary
India batted like they hadn't had time for their morning coffee
The ICC must be worried that the Federal Trade Commission is going to bring an advertising standards case against it if the cricket carries on like this
Others: The ICC is trying to sell the locals on the adverts downtown and around the ground
